import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, CardTitle, Col, Container, CustomInput, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row } from "reactstrap"; const InputComponent = () => ( Input ); const TextareaComponent = () => ( Textarea ); const Checkboxes = () => ( Checkboxes ); const CustomCheckboxes = () => ( Custom checkboxes ); const CustomSelects = () => ( Custom selects ); const Sizes = () => ( Sizes ); const Radios = () => ( Radios ); const CustomRadios = () => ( Custom radios ); const Switches = () => ( Switches ); const Selects = () => ( Selects ); const Disabled = () => ( Disabled ); const ReadOnly = () => ( Read only ); const BasicInputs = () => (

Basic Inputs

 ); export default BasicInputs;
